availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Urias M. Offutt (Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. and slaveholder.)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky, native. Son of James Doull Offutt and Mary Offutt. Married to Elizabeth Neal Garrard Offutt in Bourbon County, Kentucky, in August, 1835. Father of Anna M. Offutt Baird, Mary E. Offutt Tureman, James William Offutt, Lewis G. Offutt, and Laura Bell Offutt. Farmer in Scott County in 1850. Owned fifteen enslaved persons in Scott County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860. Owned seventeen enslaved persons in Scott County in 1860.
